pytket-aqt¶

`pytket <https://cqcl.github.io/pytket>`__ is a Python module for interfacing with CQC t|ket>, a set of quantum programming tools.

pytket_aqt is an extension to pytket that allows pytket circuits to be executed on AQT’s quantum devices and simulators.

Getting started¶

pytket_aqt is available for Python 3.6, 3.7 and 3.8, on Linux and MacOS. To install, run:

pip install pytket_aqt

pytket.backends.aqt¶

Backends for processing pytket circuits with AQT devices

class pytket.backends.aqt.AQTBackend(access_token: str, device_name: str = 'sim', label: str = '')¶

Interface to an AQT device or simulator.

__init__(access_token: str, device_name: str = 'sim', label: str = '')¶

Construct a new AQT backend.

Parameters

  • access_token (string) – AQT access token

  • device_name (string) – device name (suffix of URL, e.g. “sim/noise-model-1”)

  • label (string) – label to apply to submitted jobs

circuit_status(handle: pytket.backends.resulthandle.ResultHandle) → pytket.backends.status.CircuitStatus¶

Return a CircuitStatus reporting the status of the circuit execution corresponding to the ResultHandle

get_result(handle: pytket.backends.resulthandle.ResultHandle, **kwargs: Union[int, float, None]) → pytket.backends.backendresult.BackendResult¶

See pytket.backends.Backend.get_result(). Supported kwargs: timeout, wait.

process_circuits(circuits: Iterable[pytket.circuit.Circuit], n_shots: Optional[int] = None, valid_check: bool = True, **kwargs: Union[int, float, None]) → List[pytket.backends.resulthandle.ResultHandle]¶

See pytket.backends.Backend.process_circuits(). Supported kwargs: none.

property default_compilation_pass¶

A suggested compilation pass that will guarantee the resulting circuit will be suitable to run on this backend with as few preconditions as possible.

Returns

Compilation pass guaranteeing required predicates.

Return type

BasePass

property required_predicates¶

The minimum set of predicates that a circuit must satisfy before it can be successfully run on this backend.

Returns

Required predicates.

Return type

List[Predicate]

Module for conversion from \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) to AQT

pytket.aqt.tk_to_aqt(circ: pytket.circuit.Circuit) → List[List]¶

Convert a circuit to AQT list representation
